Yes, there are several places where you can simply sit and enjoy the view of the Rhine River:

1. Kurpark: Kurpark is a beautiful park located in the heart of the city and offers great views of the Rhine River. You can find benches and seating areas throughout the park to sit and enjoy the view.

2. Schlosspark Biebrich: Schlosspark Biebrich is a large park located along the banks of the Rhine River. It has several scenic viewpoints, including an observation tower that offers panoramic views of the river.

3. Neroberg: Neroberg is a hill that provides stunning views of Wiesbaden and the Rhine River. You can take a funicular to the top of the hill and find a seating area to admire the view.

4. Rheinuferpromenade: Rheinuferpromenade is a river promenade that stretches along the banks of the Rhine River. It has seating areas and benches where you can sit and enjoy the view of the river.
